name: TrumPiñata
description: Trumpiñata is a political piñata experience you won't want to miss. Use a baseball bat to rip him apart!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 (64bit), Windows 10 or higher Processor: Intel Core i5- 4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or greater DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
